column2: Press $0 to return to Parallel World
column4: Aperte $0 para retornar ao Mundo Paralelo

column2: A powerful force pulls you back
column4: Uma força poderosa te puxa de volta
column6: Eine unsichtbare Kraft zieht dich zurück

column14: $0 is the regular sampo name based on orbs (eg 'Echo of Green Lion', 'Echo of Sampo', 'Echo of Our Matter' etc)

column2: The $0 dissolves into a murky shadow before you can reach for it
column6: Das $0 löst sich in Schatten auf bevor du es greifen kannst
column14: $0 here is the current name of the shadow sampo (see translation above)
pun based on Sham and Sampo and also the internal name for the item, do with this what you will
pun based on the above translation, do with this what you will
